body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me

If you are reading this comment your boner will die within 5 minutes. To undo this curse you need to hit that report button on spammy "copy and paste this on 5 other manga" comments, and remove that disgusting hellspawn from existence. I'm not sorry, forgiveness was never an option.

On side note, I like this version of Team 7 so much better than the ones we got in canon, because Hinata would make a better replacement than Sakura on the team. Speaking of team, someone should do a parody of this hentai doujinshi involving simply Naruto and Sasuke, because I actually want to see what will happen.

Oh my God, this is so bad. It's ok if the art isn't that good, but there has to be pacing. The pacing in this doujin is so awful. Like, in one panel they're fucking, the other they're already gone. There has to be an indicator when the fucking is already done on the page BEFORE the transition. You can't just put a "LATER......" at the beginning of the next page without the proper transitions. 

The characters's lines and dialogue are really stiff as well. It's like a fucking toddler wrote the lines.

On page 23 it says, "BOTH DID IT INSIDE". Yeah, we, the readers, aren't fucking morons. You don't have to put that there.

I fucking hate SasuHina as a ship, but this doujin is so bad that I don't even care about that anymore.

0/10 It can't even be a "so-bad-it's-good" doujin. That's how bad it is.

I usually don't comment on doujins no matter how bad (or how much I hate it), but this...I just needed to vent. This doujin is an insult to all doujins.
I don't really like seeing Hinata fuck someone other than Naruto, but considering the situation I'm fine with it
